error_messages.guild_only: ‚ùå This command is a guild-only command!
error_messages.dev_only: ‚ùå This command is a developer-only command.
error_messages.bot_permissions: ‚ùå I need to have the `%command.perms.BotPermissions.map((p) => p.toUpperCase()).join(', ')%` permission to use this command.
error_messages.user_permissions: ‚ùå You need to have the `%command.perms.UserPermissions.map((p) => p.toUpperCase()).join(', ')%` permission to use this command.

setup_guide.title: Setting Up Guide
setup_guide.question_one_title: How can I automatically receive the Music Of The Day?
setup_guide.question_one_description: To receive the MOTD automatically, use the </setup:1199447395700842526> command. Then, let the process guide you.
setup_guide.question_two_title: What types of channels can I select for the Music Of The Day?
setup_guide.question_two_description:
Almost every type of channel available on Discord!
 - text channel
- public / private thread belonging to a text channel
- announcement channel
- public thread belonging to an announcement channel
- forum post
setup_guide.question_three_title: How do I know who to notify for the Music Of The Day?
setup_guide.question_three_description: You need to determine who might be interested in the MOTD. If your community is focused on music, then you can choose to notify a role that all server members have in common (i.e. a 'Members' role). Otherwise, if your community is not music-focused, you could set a role specifically for people interested in music.

debugging_guide.title: Debugging Guide
debugging_guide.question_one_title: Why don't I receive the Music Of The Day immediately after setting up?
debugging_guide.question_one_description: <@1115972980984516719> follows a specific schedule to send the MOTD, which is currently sent to all servers at **9:00** PM America/Toronto time. This schedule cannot be changed and is the same for everyone.
debugging_guide.question_two_title: Why don't I receive the Trivia Of The Day immediately after setting up?
debugging_guide.question_two_description: <@1115972980984516719> follows a specific schedule to send the TOTD, which is currently sent to all servers at **10:00** AM America/Toronto time. This schedule cannot be changed and is the same for everyone.
debugging_guide.question_three_title: Why don't I receive the Events Of The Day immediately after setting up?
debugging_guide.question_three_description: <@1115972980984516719> follows a specific schedule to send the EOTD, which is currently sent to all servers at **11:00** AM America/Toronto time. This schedule cannot be changed and is the same for everyone.
debugging_guide.question_four_title: The time to receive the MOTD / TOTD / EOTD has passed but I haven't received anything. Why?
debugging_guide.question_four_description: This is most likely due to a permissions issue. Check that the role of <@1115972980984516719> has the necessary permissions. Also check the permissions of the channel used for MOTD / TOTD / EOTD. Still not receiving anything? Join the official support server by clicking [here](%SupportLink%)!

about_guide.title: About Guide
about_guide.question_one_title: What is the Music Of The Day?
about_guide.question_one_description: The Music Of The Day is a song that is chosen randomly by <@1115972980984516719> and sent to all servers at **9:00** PM America/Toronto time.
about_guide.question_two_title: What is the Trivia Of The Day?
about_guide.question_two_description: The Trivia Of The Day is a trivia question about music that is chosen randomly by <@1115972980984516719> and sent to all servers at **10:00** AM America/Toronto time.
about_guide.question_three_title: What are the Events Of The Day?
about_guide.question_three_description: The Events Of The Day are a list of events that happened on this day in the history of music that is selected by <@1115972980984516719> and sent to all servers at **11:00** AM America/Toronto time.

other_guide.title: Other Guide
other_guide.question_one_title: ü§î Your question has not been answered?
other_guide.question_one_description: You can ask your question in the official support server by clicking [here](%SupportLink%).

- %motd% 
- %totd% 
- %eotd%

audio_analysis.description: üìä Here is an audio analysis for %songOfTodayRequest['title']% by %songOfTodayRequest['artist']%:

fields.field_description_one_true: Yes! %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is good for dancing with your friends!
fields.field_description_one_false: No. %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is not good for dancing with your friends.
fields.field_description_two_true: Yes! %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is energetic, with plenty of bass!
fields.field_description_five_true: %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is mainly played with acoustic instruments.
fields.field_description_five_false: %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is not mainly played with acoustic instruments.
fields.field_description_six_true: %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is a music with a positive mood.
fields.field_description_six_false: %songOfTodayRequest['title']% is a music with a negative mood.

are_you_an_artist.description:
Are you a musical artist? If yes, you can ask to be featured on preview messages like the one you've just clicked on. You don't have to pay to be featured, it's free.
‚û°Ô∏è Here are the requirements

fields.field_description_one: On a streaming platform (Spotify, Deezer, Apple Music, Soundcloud...).
fields.field_description_two: By providing proof that you really are the artist you claim to be.
fields.field_description_three: That is one of those proposed by the bot  (Global, Pop, Hip-Hop, Rock, Rap, Electro, KPOP, Latino, German, Country, Jazz, Lofi, Anime, Reggae, Hardstyle, Metal, 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s).
fields.field_description_four: To showcase talent that doesn't get the recognition it deserves, and because music is a world where everyone should be recognised for their artistic contribution.
fields.field_description_five: Join our [official server](%SupportLink%) and make a request. If your application is accepted, you will be featured on the preview messages and you will get a role on our server.

40%.description:
You are **40**% of the way through the process. Well done! üéâ 
üì± You need to choose a display mode. You can see what they look like by clicking on their respective buttons. 
Continue by clicking on the menu below.

60%.description:
You are **60**% of the way through the process. Well done! üéâ 
üßµ You need to choose whether you want a thread to be automatically created and managed by the bot for the MOTD. 
Continue by clicking on one of the buttons below.

80%.description:
You are **80**% of the way through the process. Well done! üéâ 
üèÜ You need to choose whether you want a music quiz to be sent every day. 
The concept  is simple: every day, you receive an audio file of music to listen to, and you have to guess its title! 
Continue by clicking on one of the buttons below.

90%.description:
You are **90**% of the way through the process. Well done! üéâ 
üìÜ You need to choose whether you want the list of events in the music world to be sent every day. 
The concept  is simple: every day, you receive a list of events that happened on this day in the music history! 
Continue by clicking on one of the buttons below.

95%.description:
You are **95**% of the way through the process. Well done! üéâ 
üìä You need to choose whether you want to receive a poll after each MOTD to find out what your community thinks. 
Continue by clicking on one of the buttons below.

100%.description:
You're done! You're at **100**%. Well done! üéâ
üé∂ Your server is now ready. 
Here is a quick overview of your configuration:

warning_100%.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è Please ensure that Daily Music has all the necessary permissions to work (those available in the [invitation link](%InvitationLink%)). 
Check the permissions for :
    - the bot's role
    
- the defined channel (%channel%). 
If a permission is missing, you will not receive anything and your server will be deleted from the database after a few days if the issue is not fixed.

advanced_card.description:
Welcome to the advanced configuration menu! ü§ì 
üÉè You need to choose what type of card you want for the MOTD.
Continue by clicking on the menu below

advanced_trivia.description:
Welcome to the advanced configuration menu! ü§ì
üèÜ You need to choose which type of Trivia game you want. 
Continue by clicking on one of the options below

voting_helps_us.description: By voting for Daily Music, you're helping my developer to make me more popular and you're supporting his work for free.

correct_title_trivia.description: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Here's some information about the music.
correct_title_trivia.message_ephemeral: üëè GG! You've found the title of the music.
correct_title_trivia.message_public: üëè <@%interaction.user.id%> guessed the title of the music with a precision of **%Math.round(similar * 100)%**%!

wrong_title_trivia.message_ephemeral: üò¨ Errr... You've got the title wrong!
wrong_title_trivia.message_public: üò¨ <@%interaction.user.id%> didn't guess the title of the music...

correct_year_trivia.title: You've found the release year

Continue by clicking on the menu below!

embed.description:
Thank your for using Daily Music! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Here are all the links related to the bot. ‚¨áÔ∏è
embed.field_description_one: [Click here](%InvitationLink%) to invite Daily Music to your server.
embed.field_description_two: [Click here](%SupportLink%) to join the support server.

artist_does_not_exist.description: Because this artist does not exist in our database! Maybe you mistyped his name.

error_messages.date_is_banned: ‚ùå This date is banned. Please use another date.
error_messages.date_format: ‚ùå Please use the DD-MM-YYYY date format
error_messages.date_on_before: ‚ùå Please provide a date on or before the current date
error_messages.date_feb_28: ‚ùå Please provide a date on or after February 28, 2023.
error_messages.day_not_valid: ‚ùå Please provide a valid day for %moment(month, 'MM').format('MMMM')% (01 to %maxDaysInMonth%)
error_messages.month_not_valid: ‚ùå Please provide a valid month (01 to 12).
error_messages.year_not_valid: ‚ùå Please provide a valid year (2023 to %moment().year()%).

no_music_generated.description: Because no music has been generated for this date, most likely due to an incident or maintenance.

read_date_format.description: Because Daily Music is only able to read dates in the DD-MM-YYYY format.

not_capable_future.description: Because we're not capable of generating music for the future!

service_didnt_exist.description: Because before that date, the service we use didn't exist!

service_didnt_exist_2023.description: Because before 2023, the service we're using didn't exist, and because we can't generate music for the future!

certain_numbers_of_day.description: Because there are a certain number of days in a month, we can't generate music for the 111th of December!

certain_numbers_of_month.description: Do I really need to explain?

api_down.description: The API seems to be down.

error_messages.no_config: ‚ùå No configuration found for this server.

embed.description: ‚úÖ This server's configuration has been successfully reset.

no_data.description: This means that Daily Music has no data linked to your server.

embed.description: üìö Here is a summary of your server settings.
üìä Here is a summary of the statistics from Daily Music for your server.
embed.field_description_one_true: Daily Music has sent a total of **%data.TotalSongsSent%** %musicWord% to this server, and the last one was on %timestamp:F% (%timestamp:R%).
embed.field_description_one_false: No music has yet been sent to this server.
embed.field_description_two_true: Daily Music has sent a total of **%data.TotalTriviasSent%** %triviaWord% to this server, and the last one was on %timestamp:F% (%timestamp:R%).
embed.field_description_two_false: No trivia has yet been sent to this server.
embed.field_description_three_true: Daily Music has sent a total of **%data.TotalEventsSent%** %eventWord% to this server, and the last one was on %timestamp:F% (%timestamp:R%).
embed.field_description_three_false: No events have yet been sent to this server.
embed.field_description_four_true: Daily Music has sent a total of **%data.TotalPollsSent%** %pollWord% to this server, and the last one was on %timestamp:F% (%timestamp:R%).
embed.field_description_four_false: No polls have yet been sent to this server.
